name: notiflix
description: Notiflix is a JavaScript library for client-side non-blocking notifications, popup boxes, loading indicators, and more...
author: Furkan MT (https://github.com/furcan)

scripts.notiflix-helpers-lint: npm run notiflix-helpers-constants-eslint && npm run notiflix-helpers-allinone-eslint && npm run notiflix-helpers-minifier-eslint
scripts.notiflix-src-lint: npm run notiflix-src-stylelint && npm run notiflix-src-eslint
scripts.notiflix-helpers-allinone: npm run notiflix-helpers-lint && npm run notiflix-src-lint && node helpers/notiflix-dev-allinone.js
scripts.notiflix-helpers-minifier: npm run notiflix-helpers-allinone && npm run notiflix-src-allinone-eslint && node helpers/notiflix-dev-minifier.js
